title: Amusement ride and carnival inspection certificates
dataVerified: Ride name, owner, inspector name, inspection date, mechanical/safety test results
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Inspection status (passed/failed). Link to state inspector system (public and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake ride certificates. Domain binding verifies state inspector. Public safety critical. Prevents uninspected ride operation. ASTM F770 compliance. Criminal penalties for operation without inspection.
